title: Outcast Magician and the Power of Heretics - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Supernatural
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Bullying   Character Growth   Demons   Depictions of Cruelty   Kuudere   Loli   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Nobles   Outcasts   R-15   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Takamaki   高巻 柚宇
description:
One day, Seiya, an outcast magician, and his classmates were kidnapped and their lives were in danger.

But at that time, the original power of Seiya was awakened and he safely escaped from the crisis!

But that power was considered heretical, Seiya was no longer a outcast, he was a heretical magician who was the subject of hatred by the country.>
